Toning and astringent properties for gumswith microRepair® that strengthens and protects the thin enamel of children's teeth·       Clinically tested·       Fluoride free·       Safe for childrenBiorepair® kids toothpaste protects from cavity and it is ideal for oral hygiene from the first baby tooth. The enamel of children’s teeth is more subtle and vulnerable than adults enamel. Remineralizing it is important to defend it from attacks of sugar acids. Biorepair® Kids is the only one that contains microRepair® which strengthen the enamel of deciduous teeth favoring a healthy and correct development of permanent teeth. Its effectiveness is clinically tested. The formula is delicate, fruity and contains grape extract with toning and astringent properties for gums.The formula is gentle with a fruity flavour and contains strawberry extract that tones and nourishes the gums. Its efficacy has been clinically tested, making it safe for children.  Calling all mums, your kid’s teeth are very delicate! Here’s what you've got to do to protect them from cavities and other problems:2.       Always use a toothbrush suitable for children’s teeth3.       Don’t go overboard with very acidic drinks (for example, tea, fizzy drinks, fruit juices...)4.       Don’t let them eat too much sugar and avoid too many sweets  Biorepair does NOT contain:2.       Abrasive Silica3.       Titanium Dioxide4.       Parabens5.       Sodium Lauryl Sulfate6.       Dyes
